title: hovara
author: hovara
content: Hello,I need to make $5000 until the end of the week. I am a senior fullstack software developer, also I have strong knowledge in blockchain. Except the software development I am willing to do everything as a job. I am looking short and longterm job opportunities.I am open to offers, feel free to contact me.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: hovara on November 02, 2023, 08:14:21 AMHello,I need to make $5000 until the end of the week. I am a senior fullstack software developer, also I have strong knowledge in blockchain. Except the software development I am willing to do everything as a job. I am looking short and longterm job opportunities.I am open to offers, feel free to contact me.This is pretty vague and doesn't sound too convincing.  It'd be better to beef it up with a few more details about your background and the type of work you want.  Like, what are your main skills? Any experience thats a good match? And maybe get specific about the kinds of roles or projects you're hoping for.   It helps if you can point employers to some solid examples of your work.  Got a portfolio site or GitHub profile you can link them to? That way they can check out your latest stuff and see what you can do.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: $5000 at the end of the week? That's possible but I am not gonna offer you anything. It's basically on how you're quick to complete something. Why not look at the websites like Upwork, fiverr and anything of the same? Those employers or projects that look for results based skill since you're a senior full stack developer. You are for sure aware of deadlines and I think that's your best asset right now but you just need to find the right client that has projects on works so, do your search now with those platforms that I've mentioned and others that has the same freelance market place. Might find one as well on subreddits related to crypto/freelancing.e.g.https://www.reddit.com/r/CryptoJobsList/https://www.reddit.com/r/Jobs4Bitcoins/

comments.author: Text
comments.body: I agree with example's opinion that it's unrealistic to expect to find a job or freelance project that will pay you that much money in such a short period of time. It might help in your job search if you highlight your skills and experiences.As far as I know, Australia and New Zealand are in need of developers, but you might have a hard time finding a job that fits your desires because most of them are long-term projects, and I think you'll need a team to build a project.
